attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE want our english trrops back home where they belong. Get them out of iraq now!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this instead:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/troopsout/

If you wish to have your own petition on the subject, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
